attributes.action: Repatriate British Citizens aboard who are stranded
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to repatriate the British citizens stranded aboard with nothing but their suitcases, some may not even have family or friends with them and some may not even have money.
People aren’t able to claim on their travel insurance due to Covid-19. All Airports are closing transit borders.
We urge the government in this time of need to please repatriate them. 
On behalf of everyone stranded aboard we want them repatriated.
attributes.background: Fly every British citizen back to home

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
